description: Test cases for MediaWiki list syntax conversion

cases.name: Numbered list with bold formatting
cases.wikitext:
**Tips For Hot-loading Safety:**
# If possible, have the event closed when you hot-load a change.
# Otherwise, you can press the [‚ü≥] icon on the event debug options. Be warned that this will not update saved scopes.
cases.expected:
- Tips For Hot-loading Safety:**
1. If possible, have the event closed when you hot-load a change.
